# NordiqFlow

> NordiqFlow builds Sweden's labour market OS. Two products: TalentFlow (B2C career platform) and CityIQ (B2G municipal talent analytics). Built on Arbetsformedlingen's open JobTech Dev API data.
>
> For the full text content of every page on this site, see: https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/llms-full.txt

## About

NordiqFlow is a Swedish AI company founded in 2026 by Linnea Moritz in Vetlanda. We solve a structural matching failure: Sweden spends SEK 80+ billion/year on labour market policy, yet 70,000 vacancies coexist with 8.3% unemployment. The root cause is title-based matching — Platsbanken matches job titles to job titles, ignoring the 51,000+ competency overlaps in AF's own data. NordiqFlow surfaces these hidden career pathways.

- Founder: Linnea Moritz (BSc Economics & Business, Minerva University; ex-Google, YouTube, TikTok, Clubhouse)
- Location: Vetlanda, Sweden
- Tech: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind, Supabase, Anthropic Claude, AF JobTech Dev APIs
- Stage: Pre-revenue, Vinnova application Q2 2026, pilot with Vetlanda Kommun Q3 2026

## Key Data Points

- SEK 91.2 billion: Sweden's 2026 labour market budget (Utgiftsomrade 14)
- SEK 79.8 billion: 2023 total labour market spending
- 70,000: Unfilled positions alongside 8.3% unemployment (SCB Q3 2024)
- +46-70%: Cost premium of Rusta och Matcha vs AF baseline (IFAU Rapport 2024:17)
- 0%: Measurable improvement from RoM (IFAU 2024:17)
- 51,000+: Pre-computed career transitions in AF's JobTech Dev API
- 8,000+: Mapped competencies across 430 SSYK-4 occupation codes
- 846: Registered job-seekers in Vetlanda (Dec 2025, 6.5% unemployment)

## Products

### TalentFlow (B2C)
Career intelligence for individuals. Upload CV, get AI-powered career recommendations based on competency overlap, skill gap analysis, regional demand forecasts, and salary data. Price: 299 SEK/month premium (free tier available).

### CityIQ (B2G)
Municipal talent analytics dashboard. Shows competency gaps by occupation, ROI on training investments, exportable reports for budget planning. Price: 50,000 SEK/year per municipality.

## Site Pages

- [TalentFlow (Home)](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/index.html): Main product page for TalentFlow career matching platform
- [For Investors](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/investors.html): Investment case, business model, revenue projections, roadmap, team, and moat analysis (Swedish)
- [Artiklar & Dokument](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/artiklar.html): Document library with downloadable PDFs — investor article, Vinnova application, IFAU proposal, Vetlanda LOI
- [AF Data](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/af-data.html): Guide to Arbetsformedlingen's open data: APIs, taxonomies, European standards, and how NordiqFlow uses them
- [AF:s Problem](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/af-issues.html): Five structural problems with AF's databases and matching system, and how NordiqFlow solves them
- [Tech & Modeller](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/tech.html): Technical explanation of the three-layer matching algorithm, economic theories, and ML architecture
- [Algoritmen](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/algoritmen.html): Mathematical deep-dive: scoring formulas, graph traversal, substitutability calculations, predictive models
- [Forskning](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/research.html): Academic research foundation — Nobel Prize-winning economic theory, labour market research, ML literature
- [Live Demo](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/demo.html): Interactive AI-powered career matching demo — upload CV or describe profile for recommendations
- [CityIQ](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/cityiq.html): CityIQ product page — municipal talent gap analysis and training ROI calculator
- [Visualisering](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/viz.html): Labour market data visualizations
- [Next Steps](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/next-steps.html): Development roadmap and next steps

## Downloadable Documents

- [Investor Article (English, PDF)](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/public/nordiqflow_investor_article.docx.pdf): 15-page investigative analysis of Sweden's employment matching crisis — political timeline, SEK 79.8B spending, Beveridge curve collapse, IFAU RoM evaluation, 6x ROI investment thesis
- [Vinnova Final (Swedish, PDF)](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/public/nordiqflow_vinnova_final.docx.pdf): Vinnova application summary — background, problem formulation, solution, project plan
- [IFAU Research Proposal (English, PDF)](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/public/ifau_nordiqflow_proposal_full.pdf): 9-page formal proposal to IFAU for co-designed RCT of competency-based matching — three studies, Vinnova co-funding, SEK 12.5M budget
- [Vetlanda LOI (Swedish, PDF)](https://nordiqflow.vercel.app/public/loi_vetlanda_12sidor.pdf): 12-page Letter of Intent for 6-month pilot with Vetlanda Kommun — local labour market data, ROI calculation, pilot structure, 50,000 SEK cost

## Key Sources

- IFAU Rapport 2024:17 — RCT evaluation of Rusta och Matcha
- IFAU Rapport 2025:5 — Municipal cooperation with AF
- Sveriges Riksbank, Economic Commentary — Labour Market Matching (Jan 2025)
- SCB, Job Openings and Recruitment Needs, Q3 2024
- Riksdagen, Budgetpropositionen 2025/2026, Utgiftsomrade 14
- TechSverige, Tech Talent Shortage Report 2024-2028
- JobTech Dev / AF Open Data Platform: jobtechdev.se

## Brand

- Colors: Dark navy #1a1a2e, Purple accent #667eea, Gradient #667eea to #764ba2
- Language: Site primarily in Swedish, some English content
- Tone: Professional, data-driven, competent
